head.title: Node.js Document Editing API | Edit PDF, Word, Excel, EPUB
head.description: Node.js document editing API to edit, translate, and save document pages from PDF, Microsoft Word, Excel, presentations, Visio, and image formats.

header.description: Powerful editor API to manipulate PDF, Microsoft Office, HTML, and image files.

actions.title: Ready to get started?
actions.description: Try GroupDocs.Editor features for free or request a license.

overview.title: GroupDocs.Editor at a glance
overview.description: API to edit, translate, and save documents, slides, and diagrams in Node.js applications.

feature_1.title: Effortlessly edit multiple documents in Node.js
feature_1.description: Seamlessly edit multiple PDF and Office files with support for a wide range of formats. GroupDocs.Editor for Node.js makes document editing fast and hassle-free.

feature_2.title: Translate documents to HTML/CSS
feature_2.description: Translate documents to HTML/CSS markup compatible with WYSIWYG editors, allowing easy and efficient document editing in a web environment.

feature_3.title: Save edited documents in various formats
feature_3.description: Save your edited documents back to their original format or export them to other formats such as PDF, ensuring flexibility and compatibility.

formats.title: Supported file formats
formats.description: GroupDocs.Editor for Node.js supports operations with the following [file formats](https://docs.groupdocs.com/editor/nodejs/supported-document-formats/).

features.title: GroupDocs.Editor features
features.description: Seamlessly edit, translate, and save PDF and Office documents.

feature_1.title: Edit files
feature_1.content: Edit the content of various document formats including PDF, DOCX, XLSX, PPTX, and more.

feature_2.title: Translate to HTML/CSS
feature_2.content: Convert documents to HTML/CSS for easy editing with WYSIWYG editors like CKEditor or TinyMCE.

feature_3.title: Save edited documents
feature_3.content: Save the edited HTML/CSS back to the original document format or export to PDF.

feature_4.title: Extract document information
feature_4.content: Extract information such as page count, size, and encryption status from documents.

feature_5.title: Support for various formats
feature_5.content: Edit a wide range of document formats including Microsoft Office files, PDFs, and more.

feature_7.title: Custom document encoding
feature_7.content: Specify document encoding during editing and saving processes.

feature_8.title: Font extraction
feature_8.content: Extract fonts from documents for use in the editing process.

feature_9.title: Preview pages
feature_9.content: Generate image representations of document pages to better understand content and structure.

code_samples.title: Code samples
code_samples.description: Some use cases of typical GroupDocs.Editor for Node.js operations.

sample_1.content_1: The [Document Editing](https://docs.groupdocs.com/editor/nodejs/edit-document/) feature allows you to load, edit, and save DOCX files.

platforms.title: Platform independence
platforms.description: GroupDocs.Editor for Node.js supports the following operating systems, frameworks, and package managers.
